name: Unione Nazionale Industria Conciaria
goal:
UNIC Ã¨ l'associazione di categoria, nata nel 1946 e membro di Confindustria, che
rappresenta ufficialmente l'industria conciaria italiana a livello nazionale ed
internazionale.
Promuove iniziative di sostegno al settore in ambito economico, commerciale, politicoistituzionale,
scientifico, normativo.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
Politica commerciale UE (FTAs, GSP, etc.)
Etichettatura, made in e norme correlate
Single Market for Green Products - LCA/PEF
